org.opentrafficsim.core.value.vdouble.matrix

Class DoubleMatrix<U extends Unit<U>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentrafficsim.core.value.AbstractValue<U>
      • org.opentrafficsim.core.value.vdouble.matrix.DoubleMatrix<U>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - Unit
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Value<U>, ReadOnlyDoubleMatrixFunctions<U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleMatrix.Abs, DoubleMatrix.Rel, MutableDoubleMatrix

    public abstract class DoubleMatrix<U extends Unit<U>>
extends AbstractValue<U>
implements Serializable, ReadOnlyDoubleMatrixFunctions<U>
    Immutable double matrix.

    Copyright (c) 2013-2014 Delft University of Technology, PO Box 5, 2600 AA, Delft, the Netherlands. All rights reserved.
    BSD-style license. See OpenTrafficSim License.

    Version:
    Sep 9, 2014
    Author:
    Peter Knoppers
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMatrixSI

        protected final DoubleMatrix2D getMatrixSI()
        Returns:
        matrixSI

      • deepCopyData

        protected final void deepCopyData()
        Make a deep copy of the data (used ONLY in the MutableDoubleMatrix sub class).

      • mutable

        public abstract MutableDoubleMatrix<U> mutable()
        Create a mutable version of this DoubleMatrix.
        The mutable version is created with a shallow copy of the data and the internal copyOnWrite flag set. The first operation in the mutable version that modifies the data shall trigger a deep copy of the data.
        Returns:
        MutableDoubleMatrix; mutable version of this DoubleMatrix

      • initialize

        protected final void initialize(double[][] values)
                         throws ValueException
        Import the values and convert them into SI units.
        Parameters:
        values - an array of values
        Throws:
        ValueException - when values is not rectangular

      • createMatrix2D

        protected abstract DoubleMatrix2D createMatrix2D(int rows,
                            int columns)
        This method has to be implemented by each leaf class.
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows in the matrix
        columns - the number of columns in the matrix
        Returns:
        an instance of the right type of matrix (absolute / relative, dense / sparse, etc.).

                                                            throws ValueException
        Check that a provided array can be used to create some descendant of an AbstractDoubleMatrix.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • solve

        public static DoubleVector<SIUnit> solve(DoubleMatrix<?> A,
                         DoubleVector<?> b)
                                  throws ValueException
        Solve x for A*x = b. According to Colt: x; a new independent matrix; solution if A is square, least squares solution if A.rows() > A.columns(), undetermined system solution if A.rows() < A.columns().
        Parameters:
        A - matrix A in A*x = b
        b - vector b in A*x = b
        Returns:
        vector x in A*x = b
        Throws:
        ValueException - when Matrix A is neither Sparse nor Dense.
